articles.author: James Shrubsall
articles.title: 'Definitely different': the mixed feelings of Tadej Pogačar and others on a final-day Tour de France time trial - CyclingWeekly
articles.description: But a Nice time trial has its own attractions, riders say – as well as a whole load of historic connotations
articles.content: Finishing off a Grand Tour with a time trial is not an unusual concept  it's how the Giro d'Italia ended three years in a row very recently, after all. For the Tour de France though, it hasn't happen… [+3743 chars]
